author: {'steamid': '76561198025089345', 'num_games_owned': 2174, 'num_reviews': 2934, 'playtime_forever': 5, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1488111087}
review:
一个很简单的游戏，没有关卡只有分数。
操作很简单，左右移动+空格开火，向上好像可以加速，但是想玩的好就很难了。
玩家控制一个小灰机朝前飞，并且躲避或者击毁各种穿过各种障碍...
玩两下就厌倦了，主要是不喜欢一直刷同样的场景同样的任务···

author: {'steamid': '76561198131157377', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1495913156}
review: What can I say, quite a fun and enjoyable game. It looks great, the different ships are all beautifully designed. The world rankings are there to piss me off every single time I can't beat them. It put me right in that competitive mode...ready to beat anyone and have my name on top of all others. As an Early access game it's fantastic. Great job and I can't wait to see where it goes from here.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043951934', 'num_games_owned': 519, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1468478895}

author: {'steamid': '76561198082649849', 'num_games_owned': 3116, 'num_reviews': 256, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1637332844}
review:
[h1]
Don't mistake this game with a real racing game. This is just a short buggy tech demo, that looks good only on the trailer and if you wanna play a real futuristic racer try Redout or better WipeOut.
[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198104785188', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 223, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1483956747}

this game kool to me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087604051', 'num_games_owned': 443, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 5, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1468123253}
review: This game is super laggy, and I can't turn down the graphics because there are not settings at all, do not purchese this game if you don't have a super pc, (gaming pc).

author: {'steamid': '76561198038008642', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 155, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 134, 'last_played': 1494234572}
review:
Very cool game. You can choose between 4 gliders.
Goal is it to reach a particular speed and avoid barricads to get to the boss an beat him.

The game is still at the start so there is in the moment only 1 track but more will come.
For me the game has very good potential. I'm excited how it will proceed.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965781808', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 19, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1497648543}
review: Very fun and addicting game! I love the global leaderboard! I finally made it to the first level boss and I am going to enjoy beating that boss with great satisfaction one day. Great game! Can't wait for more additions to this game!
